item.description: On Sunday, October 2, 2011, the Animal Rescue League of Southern Rhode Island will be holding its 1st Annual ‘Bahk in the Pahk’ Dog Walk at Ninigrit Park in Charlestown. It is the culmination of our summer long Dog Days of Summer Campaign. Heather Gersten, from the Lite Rock 105’s Jones and Heather in the Morning, will be joining us as well as Samboni, the Providence Bruins mascot. Along with the walk, the event will include vendors, contests, raffles and much, much more. The proceeds of this fun event will go directly to support the mission of the Animal Rescue League of SRI. Bring a picnic lunch and enjoy the music, fun and festivities! 11 am to 3 pm RAIN OR SHINE
item.name: Bahk in the Pahk Dog Walk
